headline: Lennox International (NYSE:LII) Declares US$1.15 Dividend With 4% Weekly Share Price Increase
summary: Last week, Lennox International (NYSE:LII) was at the forefront of financial discussions with its affirmation of a $1.15 per share quarterly dividend, reflecting a strong commitment to rewarding shareholders. This announcement coincided with a period where its stock price increased by 3.63%. This price movement occurred amidst broader market gains, where major indices rebounded with the S&P 500 aiming to end a four-week losing streak, potentially boosting investor sentiment. headline: Lennox Declares Quarterly Dividend
summary: The Lennox (NYSE: LII) Board of Directors approved a quarterly cash dividend of $1.15 per share of common stock, payable May 15, 2025, to stockholders of record as of April 30, 2025.
